description: A Flutter widget that displays a progress bar indicating budget spending relative to a limit, with visual cues for over-budget status.

classes.name: BudgetProgress
classes.description: A stateless widget that visualizes budget consumption with a progress bar, changing color based on whether the budget is exceeded.

methods.name: BudgetProgress
methods.description: Constructor for the BudgetProgress widget, requiring spent amount, limit, and label.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the BudgetProgress, displaying the label, progress bar, and usage percentage.
